info.screen.roleid.elf:
Sheriff Faction
Starts with a bow, can buy crossbows, poison arrows, and spirit arrows from the shop.
Poison Arrow: Target dies instantly
Spirit Arrow: Target glows and shows the number of players within a 6-block radius.
If you kill a good player, you will also die.
info.screen.roleid.photographer:
Civilian Faction
Can buy Polaroid cameras and photo paper from the shop
Press the shutter to blind people in front of you and make invisible people in the lens glow for 3s.
Can take photos to record crime scenes.
Photos taken will drop upon death.
Right-click and drag photo paper into camera to load.
Scroll wheel to adjust distance, Shift to adjust flash and exposure, right-click to take photo.
Taken photos can be dropped with Q key.
Photos drop on death.
info.screen.roleid.avenger:
Civilian Faction
Start with a protected target
When the target dies, you become a vigilante and learn the killer's name.
The target may be good/neutral/killer
info.screen.roleid.conspirator:
Killer Faction
Has a Death Note in the shop, can guess others' roles. If correct, the target player will die from heart failure.
Some shop items have changed prices, and can only buy notes, knives, guns, and lockpicks.
Three wrong guesses cause your own death.
info.screen.roleid.slippery_ghost:
Neutral Faction
Has a Slippery Ghost shop, passively gain 50 coins every 10s
Exclusive item - Blank Cartridge: Right-click target to put their gun on 30s cooldown, invisible when held.
Exclusive item - Smoke Grenade: Right-click to place, creates smoke, players entering smoke become blinded. If hit directly, clears target's sanity (smoke lasts 10s), invisible when held.
Item - Lockpick: Same effect as killer faction
Sabotage - Lights Out: Same effect as killer faction
info.screen.roleid.bomber:
Killer Faction
Has a Bomber shop, can buy bombs, firecrackers, lockpicks
Exclusive skill - Ascension: Use skill key to buy bombs, 100 coins each
Bombs purchased will beep after 5 seconds, right-click on others to pass the bomb!
Bombs are invisible to others, only shows name when held in hand.
info.screen.roleid.engineer:
Civilian Faction
Has an Engineer shop, earn coins by doing tasks
Can buy Attendant Key.
Exclusive item - Reinforcement: Can reinforce doors (protect against one crowbar attack), invisible when held.
Exclusive item - Alarm Trap (makes sound when crowbar breaks in, door locks when alarm trap is placed), invisible when held
Exclusive item - Lock: When door is picked by killer/neutral using lockpick/attendant key, picker must manually pick the lock (lockpicking mini-game). Each failed lockpick has 30% chance to break lockpick/attendant key (doesn't protect against crowbar)
Engineer can shift-right-click to remove items from doors
info.screen.roleid.boxer:
Civilian Faction
Skill: Iron Bones, grants 2.5 seconds of invincibility. CD is 2 minutes.
Can buy boxing gloves. Enemies hit by gloves are knocked back, stunned, and their items go on cooldown.
info.screen.roleid.postman:
Civilian Faction
Can buy mail from the shop, can exchange one item with someone, disappears after one use
info.screen.roleid.detective:
Civilian Faction
Point cursor at a player and press skill key to view their inventory interface.
If that player moves, the interface closes, 60s cooldown.
Crouching continuously can sense movement around you.
info.screen.roleid.stalker:
Killer Faction
Simple Description
Press skill key in crowds to gain energy, more people = faster energy gain.
When energy is full, you can left-click to stab.
After stabbing enough people and gathering enough energy, lose left-click stabbing ability.
You can then right-click to raise knife and release to dash. Anyone you dash into dies. After some time, return to previous stage
 
Detailed Description
Stage 1 -- [Cannot shop, only buy lockpicks] - Faction: Killer
1. Unlimited running, has one shield.
2. Press skill key to absorb energy until entering Stage 2.

Stage 2
1. Hunting Dagger: Your knife can left-click attack players, instant kill [CD]
2. Cannot run
Stage 3 Condition: Stab 2 people with dagger, accumulate full energy

Stage 3
1. Lose dagger Stage 2 normal attack
2. Dagger right-click charge, dash in aim direction [CD] - has behind detection [because he often kills teammates when dashing]
3. Hit triggers execution countdown:
Each execution reduces time, at 0 return to Stage 2.
info.screen.roleid.athlete:
Civilian Faction
Unlimited stamina
Use skill to gain Speed 3, cooldown 100 seconds
info.screen.roleid.admirer:
Neutral Faction
Use skill to spy on highlighted target to gain energy
When reaching 90, transform into Manipulator.
info.screen.roleid.trapper:
Killer Faction
Use skill on ground to set trap disaster marks (triggers when other players step on it, hidden from other players' view)
Upon triggering, makes loud noise revealing position and glows, applies mark to triggerer (imprisoned in place for 3 seconds)
Same person triggering twice extends to 10 seconds, third time to 25 seconds
info.screen.roleid.star:
Civilian Faction
Use skill to make all players within 30 blocks look at you, glow for 2 seconds.
Can see how many people are looking at you.
info.screen.roleid.veteran:
Civilian Faction
Starts with a military knife, same effect as killer, disappears after one use - 60s cooldown, killing good players has brain penalty.
Using knife triggers Joker's frenzy mode but doesn't consume knife usage count.
Veteran can buy military knives from the shop.
info.screen.roleid.singer:
Civilian Faction
Can buy four record discs from the shop
Buying corresponding discs provides different buffs/debuffs to people around.
They are:
- Speed I
- Recover 1% sanity per second
- Slowness I
- Mining Fatigue V (effective when killer enters frenzy mode)
info.screen.roleid.psychologist:
Civilian Faction
With sanity above 70, use skill on a person, target needs to stay still, can restore their sanity to full after more than ten seconds
Eating mint candies restores (35%) sanity and gives 50 coins, mint candies can be dropped with Q key
info.screen.roleid.puppeteer:
Neutral Faction
Simple Description
Right-click corpses to collect, after collecting certain amount enter next stage.
After entering next stage, press skill key to release puppet, when puppet dies return to main body, puppet is random killer role.
During puppet release, puppeteer's main body stays in place.
 
Detailed Description
Stage 1 -- Faction: Neutral
1. Can right-click a corpse to make it disappear, recycle
Evolution condition: collect certain number of corpses then become killer faction [corpse count to collect is total players divided by six, corpse collection skill has 10s cooldown]
2. Renders as red to brown gradient in instinct

Stage 2
1. Can no longer recycle corpses
2. Use skill to create fake creatures and control fakes [skill times based on collected corpse count]
3. Killer faction main body cannot use shop
4. When controlling fake, if fake dies it doesn't truly die but returns to main body view [if main body survives]
5. When controlling fake, if main body dies, clears fake and causes player death
6. Controlling fake randomly changes role to random killer role
7. Controlling fake limited to one minute, after one minute returns to Stage 2 normal attack
8. Return to main body, reset role to puppeteer
9. Puppet and main body inventories are independent.
10. Fake creation cooldown
info.screen.roleid.better_vigilante:
Civilian Faction
Passive Skill: Last Stand
When only 2 good players remain on field, gain a derringer and grenade.
Derringer: Only regains ammo when hitting player, cd is 2 seconds.
info.screen.roleid.awesome_binglus:
Civilian Faction
Start with sticky notes.
You can paste sticky notes on others.
Can buy sticky notes from shop.
info.screen.roleid.bartender:
Civilian Faction
Can see players who drank drinks
Can see if food or drink is poisoned
Can see if players are poisoned
Can buy shield drink from shop, blocks all damage (but not if falling!)
Players with shield show blue border in bartender's view
Players with both shield and poison show yellow-green border in bartender's view
info.screen.roleid.coroner:
Civilian Faction
Can see deceased info (cause of death, time of death), can detect fake corpses.
Can sense surrounding corpses every so often.
info.screen.roleid.doctor:
Civilian Faction
When doctor exists on field, killer faction likely has poison master.
Starts with a one-time defibrillator (invisible to other players).
Defibrillator: Use on living player, target player receives notification. If player used with defibrillator dies within 120s, they revive after 30s.
Syringe: Can treat poisoned people, after death syringe passes to another civilian faction player.
Can spend 50 to buy poison testing reagent, can test if target is poisoned.
When doctor is alive on field, players dying in less than 45 seconds cannot use killer instinct and have limited vision within 45 seconds after death!.
info.screen.roleid.noisemaker:
Civilian Faction
Voice range greatly increased, corpse glows on death.
Using skill increases your voice range by 4 times
info.screen.roleid.recaller:
Civilian Faction
Use skill to mark a location, use again to spend 100 coins to return to marked location
info.screen.roleid.voodoo:
Civilian Faction
Can bind a person, when you are killed (except by terrain damage), your bound person also dies
!!!Sheriff killing voodoo doesn't trigger penalty
info.screen.roleid.jester:
Neutral Faction
Starts with fake gun and fake knife, when killed by good person triggers frenzy (killer killing doesn't trigger frenzy)
Can buy fake poison, fake poison can be triggered by poison master's catalyst.
info.screen.roleid.vulture:
Neutral Faction
Use skill to eat corpses, eaten corpse information is erased (coroner sees garbled text)
Need to eat one corpse every six people (minimum two)
After eating corpse you have gray particle effect, so please don't eat corpses in public
After reaching number becomes random killer
info.screen.roleid.executioner:
Killer Faction
Cannot buy knives and frenzy. But your guns are extremely cheap.
When you kill player with gun, has chance of not dropping gun in hand
You start locked on a target (target has yellow highlighted border), after target dies executioner gains 50 coins
Executioner cannot kill players other than target, after target dies switches to new target
Note: Your grenades can also only kill your target and cannot affect others
info.screen.roleid.morphling:
Killer Faction
Use skill to change skin -- lasts 35 seconds - CD 20 seconds.
Can buy illusion bottle, creates mist, blinds people around and forces perspective change. Invisible when held.
info.screen.roleid.phantom:
Killer Faction
Use skill to become invisible, doesn't hide items in hand, you still have collision when invisible
info.screen.roleid.ghost:
Civilian Faction
Cannot be seen by killer instinct (but can be seen by some neutral roles' wallhacks)
You can view remaining game time.
When 3 minutes remain in game, skill unlocks, can spend 150 coins to use skill and become invisible, you still have collision when invisible.
info.screen.roleid.gambler:
Neutral Faction
Draw a role every 30s, use skill key to select.
Can pick up pistol.
Can use pistol to crouch right-click suicide to become selected role.
After being killed by others, 33% chance become killer faction role,
33% chance become sheriff faction role,
33% chance die,
1% chance solo victory
info.screen.roleid.attendant:
Civilian Faction
Has an attendant key that can be used 5 times (can open dorm doors)
Can buy flashlight from shop (very effective when lights are off)
Can see player's room number when aiming at player.
info.screen.roleid.swapper:
Killer Faction
Open backpack to select player then swap two people's positions.
When activating skill has 2.5s delay, during which swapper cannot move.
Swapped players receive notification.
info.screen.roleid.conductor:
Civilian Faction
Starts with a master key and a telescope.
Telescope can observe player names from afar.
Drops both on death.
info.screen.roleid.the_insane_damned_par:
Killer Faction
You can hear voices of the dead.
You can disguise as a corpse.
Disguised corpse can be detected by coroner, and not invincible during corpse disguise
info.screen.roleid.broadcaster:
Civilian Faction
You start with 200 coins, can spend 100 to broadcast to server once.
You can edit broadcast message anytime, broadcast messages will be saved until successfully sent.
When you die, if there are saved messages, they will be automatically sent.
All players will learn of your death.
You can view remaining game time.
info.screen.roleid.manipulator:
Killer Faction
You can manipulate target player for several seconds.
Manipulated player cannot control themselves and moves in random direction.
info.screen.roleid.poisoner:
Killer Faction
When you appear on killer faction, good faction definitely has a doctor role.
You can see poisoned players through walls, can buy poison needles, and buy poison and scorpions at lower prices.
Poison needle is ranged weapon (range: 12 blocks), aim and hit player, player will die from poison after 30 seconds, one-time use.
Can buy a catalyst, right-click to use catalyst to make all poisoned players die immediately (including jester's fake poison).
info.screen.roleid.thief:
Neutral Faction
You can use skill to steal target player's coins.
info.screen.roleid.amnesiac:
Neutral Faction
You can see surrounding corpses through walls.
Before stealing role, you need to do tasks to maintain sanity.
Right-click interact with corpse to gain corpse's role.
Your victory goal is same as stolen role's victory goal.
info.screen.roleid.arsonist:
Neutral Faction
Simple Description
Use gasoline can right-click on players to pour gasoline.
When enough players are poured, lighter enters cooldown, after cooldown completes igniting gasoline won't cause your death.
Burn everyone to victory.
 
Detailed Description
Right-click gasoline can on player to pour gasoline, right-click lighter to ignite gasoline.
If not enough players have been poured, when you use lighter to ignite gasoline you will die from ignition.
When lighter enters cooldown, after cooldown completes igniting gasoline won't cause your death.
Arsonist shows as good player in killer instinct.
Note: Others can see your gasoline can and lighter in hand
If you burn everyone, arsonist wins.
info.screen.roleid.avaricious:
Killer Faction
Your starting game coins are only 50.
Pickpocket steals coins from surrounding players every minute.
Each player provides certain amount of coins to pickpocket.
Stolen coins fluctuate with total player count.
info.screen.roleid.initiate:
Neutral Faction
Simple Description
Do tasks to save money, buy knife to stab another initiate.
If you personally stab another initiate you become killer.
If another initiate dies from other reasons, you become amnesiac.
 
Detailed Description
Two initiates appear in one game, only spawns in 12+ player games. If only one initiate on field, you become amnesiac after 5s.
You can see another initiate's position through walls.
You can buy a knife for 200 coins, this knife can only be used to stab another initiate.
If you stab someone else, you die from failed assessment.
You belong to good faction, unlike good faction, you cannot pick up guns, being shot by good people has no brain penalty.
When you successfully stab another initiate, you become random killer role.
If another initiate dies from other factors, you become amnesiac.
If as initiate you get killed, on death you become amnesiac, in coroner's eyes you are amnesiac.
If game ends with good victory and both initiates survive, both initiates win with good faction.
After assassination complete, your victory goal is same as killer.
If another initiate dies from murder or suicide, your victory goal is same as transformed role.
info.screen.roleid.necromancer:
Killer Faction
You have ability to resurrect dead players.
When killer faction count is less than initial killer count of this game, you can resurrect dead players (cooldown: 3 minutes).
And make resurrected person become regular killer.
You cannot buy any items and weapons, but you still have killer instinct.
When resurrecting dead player, plays totem sound and announces to server.
info.screen.roleid.recorder:
Neutral Faction
Only enables in 10+ player games.
You have killer wallhack.
Starts with a record notebook for guessing player identities.
Notebook records existing roles and player info on field, invisible to others.
Suggest recording neutral role identities that can change their own role as soon as possible.
Achieve victory after guessing 30% of player count identities.
After 10 wrong guesses, you die.
info.screen.modifier.lovers:
Modifier
You will be bound as lovers with another random player (lover assignment unrelated to faction).
When one lover dies, the other dies from suicide.
If you and your lover survive to end, lovers win.
info.screen.modifier.refugee:
Modifier
Players with refugee modifier will revive as outlaws 120 seconds after death.
After becoming outlaw, you need to kill all players to win.
If you are killed after becoming outlaw, game time on field/inventory/coins/sanity rolls back to moment outlaw revived.
All players killed during outlaw period will revive.
info.screen.modifier.taskmaster:
Modifier
Killer/neutral/civilian players gain extra coins after completing tasks
info.screen.modifier.allergist:
Modifier
When players eat food/drink drinks, has chance to trigger one of following effects.
33% nothing happens, 33% immune to 1 poison, 33% gain Speed 2, 1% death
info.screen.modifier.cursed:
Modifier
Gain random potion effect every 30s
After you die, this modifier will be passed to your killer.
After curse is passed, it overwrites your original modifier.
info.screen.modifier.secretive:
Modifier
Others cannot get information from your corpse.
info.screen.modifier.knight:
Modifier
When player is in dark environment, has chance to swap positions with other players.
info.screen.modifier.split_personality:
Modifier
Two people share one body, switch personalities every 60s or press key to actively switch.
Default is first personality's skin.
The other personality can hear current personality's voice and see the screen.
When main body dies, both personalities need to choose "Deceive" or "Dedicate".
If both choose "Deceive" then main body dies immediately.
If one chooses "Deceive" and one chooses "Dedicate", the "Deceive" side revives, "Dedicate" side dies immediately.
If both choose "Dedicate", both personalities revive but survival time only 60s and retain pre-death inventory.
announcement.goals.elf: You believe even traditional bows and crossbows can deliver a heavy blow to killers!
announcement.goals.awesome_binglus: You have many sticky notes and can paste them on others, mark people as much as possible.
announcement.goals.bartender: Can see players who drank drinks and are poisoned through walls and use defensive potions to protect civilians!
announcement.goals.better_vigilante: When remaining civilians + vigilante count on field is not more than 2, you will gain powerful weapons for last stand!
announcement.goals.broadcaster: Broadcast messages to all players, cost 100 coins. Your death will be known by all.
announcement.goals.conductor: Use master key to open all doors on the train!
announcement.goals.executioner: You can only attack your target, use pistol to kill all your targets.
announcement.goals.jester: Find killers and work with them.
announcement.goals.morphling: Use morphing and illusion bottles to fool everyone.
announcement.goals.noisemaker: You have larger voice broadcast range, on death expose your position to all players.
announcement.goals.phantom: Become invisible, but be careful not to bump into people.
announcement.goals.recaller: Teleport to any location on the train!
announcement.goals.photographer: Take photos of all crimes as much as possible, discover killers hiding in crowds!
announcement.goals.the_insane_damned_par: You can hear voices of the dead and can disguise as a corpse.
announcement.goals.trapper: Use traps to limit other players' movement.
announcement.goals.voodoo: Choose a player to die with you.
announcement.goals.vulture: Eat corpses to transform into killer.
announcement.goals.sheriff: Complete tasks with your gun to earn coins.
hud.coroner.death_info: Died %s seconds ago, cause of death is
hud.voodoo.tip: Voodoo death must be triggered by another player!
hud.vulture.already_consumed: This corpse has already been eaten.
item.noellesroles.defense_vial.tooltip:
Right-click on drink tray to use
Clears all poisons on tray
Gives player drinking protected drink an extra death immunity.
item.trainmurdermystery.defense_vial.too:
Right-click on drink tray to use
Clears all poisons on tray
Gives player drinking protected drink an extra death immunity.
item.noellesroles.delusion_vial.tooltip:
Right-click on food/drink tray to use
Creates fake poison, makes player eating poisoned item
think they're poisoned but has no actual effect.
item.noellesroles.boxing_glove.tooltip: Charge for 0.4 seconds then attack, hit stuns target and seals items for 1.5 seconds
item.noellesroles.catalyst.tooltip: Right-click to use, kills all poisoned players immediately
item.noellesroles.sheriff_gun_maintenanc:
Right-click to use to maintain your pistol
Restores pistol durability and resets cooldown
Gain 150 coins after use
screen.broadcaster.title: Broadcast Message
tip.phantom.activing: Invisibility remaining: %ss, press %s to exit invisibility
announcement.goals.illusionist: Use illusion bottles to disrupt enemies' vision!
screen.noellesroles.loot.lockGameTip: Press 'W' to try lockpicking, press 'A'/'D' to move lockpick
game.win.gambler: Gambler wins with 1% probability, he's laughing at everyone!
gui.noellesroles.gambler.title: Gambler Role Selection
hud.noellesroles.gambler.revolver_tip: Hold gun and crouch right-click to suicide and change role
screen.noellesroles.gambler.hint: Press ESC to return or cancel
announcement.goals.avenger: Protect your bound target. If they die, you will gain the power of vengeance!
announcement.goals.conspirator: Guess other players' identities. If correct, they will die in 5 seconds!
announcement.goals.slippery_ghost: Use your exclusive shop to interfere with players of other factions!
announcement.goals.telegrapher: Use your ability to send anonymous messages to all players, up to 6 times!
announcement.goals.engineer: Use maintenance tools, alarm traps and locks to protect passengers, prevent killers from breaking doors!
announcement.goals.boxer: Use Iron Bones and boxing gloves to counter attackers, protect yourself and passengers!
announcement.goals.postman: Use mail to secretly exchange items with players.
announcement.goals.detective: Spend 200 coins to inspect player's inventory. Crouching can sense footsteps of people around!
item.noellesroles.conspiracy_page.toolti: Right-click to use to guess a player's role
item.noellesroles.blank_cartridge.toolti: Right-click on target player to use, puts their gun on 30s cooldown
item.noellesroles.smoke_grenade.tooltip: Throw to create smoke area, entrants become blinded; direct hit clears target's sanity
item.noellesroles.reinforcement.tooltip: Right-click on door to reinforce, defends against one crowbar attack; crouch right-click to unjam and remove item
item.noellesroles.alarm_trap.tooltip: Right-click on door to place trap, sounds alarm when triggered by crowbar
item.noellesroles.lock.tooltip: Right-click to lock door, can block lockpicks
item.noellesroles.delivery_box.tooltip: Aim at player and right-click to use, opens secret transfer interface
item.noellesroles.defibrillator.tooltip: Right-click on living player to use, if that player dies within 120 seconds, they will revive after 30 seconds
item.noellesroles.antidote_reagent.toolt: Right-click on player to use, check if they are poisoned
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.prote: You have been used with defibrillator! If you die within 120 seconds, you will revive after 30 seconds.
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.must_: Can only use defibrillator on living players!
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.alrea: That player already has defibrillator protection!
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.too_l: This corpse has been dead too long, cannot revive!
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.playe: Cannot find the player corresponding to this corpse!
message.noellesroles.doctor.penalty: Because doctor is alive, you cannot use killer instinct and have limited vision within 45 seconds after death!
message.noellesroles.penalty.limit.god_j: Because conspirator and insane killer both alive, while they both survive, you cannot use killer instinct and have limited vision!
message.noellesroles.penalty.limit.death: You cannot view their cause of death!
message.noellesroles.penalty.limit.playe: You cannot view this player's name!
message.noellesroles.penalty.unlimit: Your killer instinct and vision restored!
message.noellesroles.avenger.bound: You are protecting %s. If they die, you will gain the power of vengeance!
message.noellesroles.avenger.activated: %s has been killed! Your heart of vengeance has awakened!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.correct: You guessed correctly! %s will die in 20 seconds...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.wrong: You guessed wrong! %s is not this role.
message.noellesroles.conspirator.wrong_w: You guessed wrong! %s is not this role. (Remaining %s chances)
message.noellesroles.conspirator.too_man: You guessed wrong too many times! Conspiracy backfires...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.cursed: You feel a mysterious force surrounding you...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.killed: %s has been killed by your conspiracy!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.not_con: Only conspirator can use this item!
tip.noellesroles.conspirator.no_target: Use conspiracy book page to guess player role
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.title: Conspiracy Book
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.hint: Press ESC to return or cancel
message.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.smok: %s was directly hit by smoke grenade, sanity cleared!
tip.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.shop: Press TAB to open slippery ghost shop
message.noellesroles.broadcaster.no_uses: You have used all sending times!
tip.noellesroles.broadcaster.hint: Press G key to open broadcast editing interface
screen.noellesroles.broadcaster.title: Broadcast Editor
screen.noellesroles.broadcaster.hint: Enter message and click send button
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforced: Door reinforced! Can defend against one crowbar attack.
message.noellesroles.engineer.already_br: This door is already broken, cannot reinforce!
message.noellesroles.engineer.not_engine: Only engineer can use this item!
message.noellesroles.engineer.trap_trigg: Alarm! Someone is breaking the door lock!
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforcem: Reinforcement was destroyed by crowbar, but door still intact
tip.noellesroles.engineer.shop: Press TAB to open engineer shop
message.noellesroles.postman.delivery_re: %s wants to transfer items with you
tip.noellesroles.postman.shop: Press TAB to open postman shop
message.noellesroles.detective.on_cooldo: Skill on cooldown, need %s more seconds
hud.noellesroles.detective.ready: Inspect ready! Press G and aim at target
screen.noellesroles.postman.title: Secret Transfer
screen.noellesroles.postman.hint: Click item slot to place item, after both parties confirm, exchange completes
message.noellesroles.boxer.ability_activ: Iron Bones activated! Immune to any death for 1.5 seconds!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_succe: Counter successful! %s knocked back by your Iron Bones!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_knife: Your knife was knocked back! Entering cooldown...
message.noellesroles.boxing_glove.hit_by: You were hit by boxing glove!
hud.noellesroles.boxer.ready: Iron Bones ready - Press G to activate
message.noellesroles.boxer.on_cooldown: Iron Bones on cooldown, %s seconds remaining
announcement.goals.athlete: Use your unlimited stamina and sprint skill to help passengers complete tasks!
message.noellesroles.athlete.ability_act: Sprint activated! Speed boosted for 20 seconds!
message.noellesroles.athlete.on_cooldown: Sprint on cooldown, need %s more seconds
hud.noellesroles.athlete.ready: Sprint ready - Press G to activate
announcement.goals.stalker: Observe in shadows, draw power from fear. Complete evolution, hunt everyone.
message.noellesroles.stalker.immunity_tr: At the last moment, some force protected you.
announcement.goals.admirer: Observe your bound target to accumulate energy, after full energy transform into Manipulator!
hud.noellesroles.admirer.title: Admirer
message.noellesroles.admirer.target_died: Your bound target has died! Rebinding...
message.noellesroles.trapper.no_ground: Cannot find ground to place trap!
message.noellesroles.trapper.trap_trigge: You triggered trap! Imprisoned for %s seconds!
message.noellesroles.trapper.mark_count: You have been marked %s times, imprisonment time increased!
announcement.goals.star: You are the spotlight focus! Use skill to make yourself glow and make surrounding players' eyes look at you!
hud.noellesroles.star.title: Star
hud.noellesroles.star.ready: Spotlight ready - Press G to use
message.noellesroles.star.attracted: ✨ Your attention was attracted by Star!
message.noellesroles.star.on_cooldown: Spotlight on cooldown, need %s more seconds
announcement.goals.veteran: Starts with a knife. After using it to kill someone, the knife will disappear.
message.noellesroles.veteran.knife_used: Your knife has been used and disappeared!
announcement.goals.singer: You are a singer! Can buy record discs to provide buffs/debuffs to people around, let everyone hear your singing!
hud.noellesroles.singer.title: Singer
message.noellesroles.singer.on_cooldown: Singing on cooldown, need %s more seconds
announcement.goals.psychologist: You can restore others' sanity and distribute your mint candies!
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.title: Psychologist
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.ready: Healing ready - Press G and aim at target
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.not_ready: Your sanity must be above 70 to heal others
message.noellesroles.psychologist.on_coo: Healing on cooldown, need %s more seconds
message.noellesroles.psychologist.not_fu: Your sanity must be above 70 to use this skill!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.healin: Starting healing %s. Keep target still for 10 seconds!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.being_: %s is healing your mind. Please stay still!
announcement.goals.puppeteer: Collect corpses to evolve. After evolving, use collected corpses to create puppets and control them to hunt!
hud.noellesroles.puppeteer.title: Puppeteer
hud.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ready: Puppet ready - Press G to use (%d puppets available)
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.phase2_ad: You have collected enough corpses! You are now a Puppet Master!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ac: Puppet activated! You have %ss of hunting time!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ti: Puppet time exhausted, returning to body...
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.body_died: Your main body was killed! Game over.
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.shop_bloc: Puppet Master cannot use shop in body mode!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.ability_c: Puppet skill on cooldown, %s seconds remaining
announcement.goals.manipulator: Choose a player as target to control. Target will move randomly! Lasts 50 seconds, you die when main body dies!
hud.noellesroles.manipulator.title: Manipulator
message.noellesroles.manipulator.control: Starting to control %s! You have 50 seconds!
Control ended due to unavoidable reasons
message.noellesroles.manipulator.being_c: You are being controlled by Manipulator! Cannot act normally...
message.noellesroles.manipulator.body_di: Your main body was killed! Game over.
message.noellesroles.manipulator.target_: %s was killed while you were controlling them!
game.win.recorder: Recorder successfully recorded 40% of player identities and achieved victory!
announcement.goals.recorder: Use record notebook to guess other players' roles. If correct guesses reach 40% of total players, you will achieve solo victory!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.recorder: Use record notebook to guess other players' roles. If correct guesses reach 40% of total players, you will achieve solo victory!
item.noellesroles.written_note.tooltip: Right-click to use to record player identities
screen.noellesroles.recorder.title: Record Notebook
screen.noellesroles.recorder.hint: Press ESC to return or cancel
message.noellesroles.recorder.already_gu: You have already recorded this player!
message.noellesroles.recorder.died_from_: You died from too many recording errors!
message.noellesroles.recorder.win: Recorder %s completed all records and achieved victory!
insane.tip.over: Press G to end fake death
insane.tip.ready: Disguise ready - Press G to activate
announcement.goals.bomber: Buy bombs, pass and kill other players.
message.noellesroles.cooldown: Cannot use ability: ability on cooldown
message.noellesroles.admin.free_cam_hint: Admin can use /nr_free_cam to remove restriction
message.tip.for_killer: Press ALT to toggle killer instinct
announcement.goals.ghost: Killers cannot see you through walls, you can use skill to become invisible.
announcement.goals.doctor: You will step here together with poison master, guard everyone's safety with your medical equipment
announcement.goals.attendant: Use your attendant key and flashlight to help civilians in darkness
message.noellesroles.ghost.ability_unloc: Your skill has unlocked! You can now become invisible!
screen.noellesroles.guess_role.title: Identity Guess Note
info.screen.roleid.monitor:
Civilian Faction
You can use skill key to mark a player and see their position through walls.
announcement.goals.monitor: You can mark a player and see their position through walls.
message.noellesroles.swapper.swapped: Your position was swapped by Swapper!
item.poison_arrow.name: Poison Arrow
info.screen.roleid.patroller:
Sheriff Faction
When someone dies within 30 blocks of your vision, you gain a patroller pistol and an attendant key.
Patroller pistol: Has independent cooldown, can exist together with revolver.
Attendant key: Can open any room door, can be used 5 times.
announcement.goals.patroller: When you witness a murder with your own eyes, you will uphold the final justice of this journey.
info.screen.roleid.glitch_robot:
Civilian Faction
You have no mood.
Have double stamina limit
Immune to poison
Glitch occurs every 30 seconds (immobilized for 3.5 seconds)
After death leaves glitch current (players in current have Slowness II effect)
Can buy night vision goggles and glowstone dust from shop
When wearing night vision goggles, buying glowstone dust can charge night vision goggles
announcement.goals.glitch_robot: You were abandoned here, find a way out together with good people!
info.glitch_robot.noglasses_on_head: Your night vision goggles aren't worn, cannot take off.
info.glitch_robot.take_off_glasses.succe: Your night vision goggles have been taken off.
info.glitch_robot.take_off_glasses.tip: Press %s to take off night vision goggles!
gui.roleintroduce.details.title: %s %s Details
screen.roleintroduce.click_to_select:
Click to view %s %s details
%s
Click to view all
gui.roleintroduce.select_role.title: Please select an item to get introduction
screen.roleintroduce.hint: Press ESC to return or cancel
hud.lobby.hint.line1: Press %s key to view role introduction
hud.lobby.hint.line2: Press %s key in game to record player identities
tip.n.letter.name: Dear %s, welcome aboard %s!
tip.n.letter.room: Enclosed is your ticket and access to your cabin
tip.n.letter.tooltip1: Your cabin is only for your %s journey
tip.n.letter.tooltip2: Astral Express Team wishes you a pleasant and safe journey
